meanings.definition: The act of interlacing or intertwining.
meanings.sent1: The interlacements of the vines created a beautiful pattern on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The artist used various colors to create intricate interlacements in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The interlacements of spaghetti on my plate made it look like a messy art project.
meanings.sent4: The interlacements of branches in the forest formed a natural canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The interlacements of yarn in the knitting project were both challenging and rewarding.

meanings.definition: Things that are interlaced or intertwined.
meanings.sent1: The interlacements of the ropes on the ship were strong and secure.
meanings.sent2: The interlacements of the vines in the garden created a dense, green wall.
meanings.sent3: The interlacements of wires in the electronics store looked like a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: The interlacements of roots in the ground formed a complex network underground.
meanings.sent5: The interlacements of hair in the brush were difficult to untangle.
